name: Descend to the end
description:
-Game Description-

In this game, you will have to descend (unexpected, right?) through a mysterious dungeon that will take you to castles, pyramids and even the freaking hell. Fight against some enemies, avoid shadows and try to defeat some bosses in order to... Rescue your cat? Improve your previous score? Fight boredom? Feel free to choose. 

Also, don't forget to rest between fights in order to recover and get stronger or you will probably die, losing all your progress in the process. Cool, huh?

Will you be able to master the combat system and reach the bottom of this crazy place?

-Credits-

This game has been created for the Secret Santa Jam 2022.

All Art, coding and design has been done by Gemarcx.

Sound effects obtained from https://www.zapsplat.com.
